channel.title: Please help me
channel.description:
I don't know where i'd post this question,
but once i post a server on the server status page, it says i need to verify it -
where do i verify it?
i have the user name and password but idk where to verify it? Please help

item.title: Please help me
item.dc:creator: @NewbieNewty Newty
item.description:
@NewbieNewty wrote:

There is a thread for these question’s in the server development section.

But to answer your question, you need to login to your server with the username and password that the status page gives you, then log out. Then you have to wait for the status page to check if your server is online.

Read full topic

item.title: Please help me
item.dc:creator: @wrking wrking
item.description:
@wrking wrote:

Then what do i do with the user name and password it gave me?

Read full topic

item.title: Please help me
item.dc:creator: @Evan1 Evan`
item.description:
@Evan1 wrote:

You my friend don’t have to do anything.It automatically sends it to the staff to verify.

Read full topic
